title: Same over and over
body: I know that after each lvl u get a capsule, but capsules are just poor. I keep getting 4 champs over and over and I even got 2 master yis in same capsule. Can someone explain me drop rate cuz I only get 450 BE or 1350 BE champions.

replies.body: It looks like, overall, that capsule gave you shards equalling about 810 BE. While that's a bit on the lower end of what's possible, it does line up with [**Mortdog's post about intended BE drops beyond level 30**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/Jh3Mtzu6-blue-essence-earn-rates-learning-the-numbers-with-carl-and-henrietta).
